Yes, it's true!  I'm the author of
	ping for UNIX.
Ping is a little thousand-line hack that I wrote in an evening which
practically everyone seems to know about. :-)


I named it after the sound that a
sonar makes, inspired by the whole principle of echo-location.

so the "Cyberspace" analogy seemed very apt.

links.title: Wikipedia:IP addresses are not people - Wikipedia
links.description: Unregistered users are those identified only by their IP address. The archaic term "anonymous editor" is misleading; in fact, the IP address provides a rough geographical location of the editor.
